item.title: Using KubeAI Application Nucleus for edge (KAN)
item.description: Using KubeAI Application Nucleus for edge Introduction I have a real world scenario requirement to implement an environmental sensor to count vehicles driving infront of my balcony. To do this my inital idea was to set up a camera and attach it to a Coral/TPU powered Rasperry Pi to catch the stream from the camera and count vehicles. As we all know, RPis and also TPUs arent available and anything then a good deal at the moment.
